streamlitUrl.title: Streamlit App URL
streamlitUrl.description: The URL of your Streamlit app to keep alive

intervalMinutes.title: Ping Interval (minutes)
intervalMinutes.description: How often to ping the app (in minutes). For free tier: use 5 minutes with 6 pings (30 min total), schedule every hour.

maxPings.title: Maximum Number of Pings
maxPings.description: Total number of pings before the actor stops. For free tier: use 6 pings with 5-minute intervals (30 min runs), schedule every hour.

timeout.title: Request Timeout (ms)
timeout.description: Maximum time to wait for a response in milliseconds
